entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
